name: Fractale Demo
description:
This is the demo of a very difficult game that was inspired by a game called Undertale. You have to avoid attacks and also charge up your blue ring to escape from boss fights. There are also a few puzzles. This game will also work with a controller.

The goal is to dodge dangerous attacks and also stand still which will charge the blue ring. Once the ring is charged you can escape the boss fight. You can also jump over attacks by pressing space or A on a controller (this has a cool down). However you can't jump over spiky obstacles.

Keyboard controls:

• WASD or Arrow Keys to move

• Space Bar to jump

Controller:

• Left Stick to move

• A to jump

This is just the demo, but the full version will come out sometime in 2020!
